en.name: Rightful Reward
en.passiveDescription: When the wielder is healed, restore {{8//10//12//14//16}} Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 10s, and can occur even when the character is not on the field.

zh.name: 公义的酬报
zh.passiveDescription: 受到治疗时，恢复{8//10//12//14//16}}点能量，该效果每10秒至多触发一次，角色处于队伍后台时也能触发。
